validation-study-intro.title: Want a test for COVID if you are sick, and help vital research?
validation-study-intro.subtitle: King's College London is launching a new study on diagnosing COVID with this app. If you report feeling unwell we may ask you to be tested.
validation-study-intro.info: All you have to do is to keep reporting regularly on this app and we pass the data to them
